attributes.action: examine the authenticity of the RNFPN scheme - and how credits are made between private and state pension schemes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like many students nurses, who trained in the early 1990's, I was coerced into opting out of the NHS superannuation scheme pensions scheme, but opted back in, when it became clear that some of the commercial practices were fraudulent. Please supervise the recruitment practices of independent companies and faciliate greater ease with which money can be paid back. Many people have different schemes and having recommended that the public take out their own funds to provide for old age, the British government should still have some vicarious liability in ensuring those schemes are legitimate. What happens if individuals do not make it to old age ? What happens if the advice is wrong ? What happens if you wish to change your mind ?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
